answers.answer: Contact the American Diabetes Foundation, they should be able to point you in the right direction.
I understand that wallmart has relatively low cost diabetic supplies.  So you may also check that out.
Thank you both for you response to my question.......kaybee2411

question: I'm looking for help with diabetic supplies, mainly test strips and lancets. I have two different meters-One Touch Ultra Mini and Accu-Chek Aviva. Is there any place to get free supplies or very low cost supplies for these meters? Your suggestions ar greatly appreciated!     Thank you !   Patricia Boardrow -Oregon
title: Diabetic test strips
